sentences.sContent: The professor improvised a poem in the class.
sentences.sContent_eng: The professor improvised a poem in the class.
sentences.sCn: 教授在课堂上即兴创作了一首诗。

sentences.sContent: The professor lambasted me for my careless mistake.
sentences.sContent_eng: The professor lambasted me for my careless mistake.
sentences.sCn: 教授严厉批评了我的粗心错误。

sentences.sContent: We were laughing about that absent-minded professor.
sentences.sContent_eng: We were laughing about that absent-minded professor.
sentences.sCn: 我们都在笑那个心不在焉的教授。

sentences.sContent: ...how about what one Hunter College professor reportedly did recently for her final exam: She encouraged the class not to stress or even study...
...and now I have a professor who issues take-home ones...
...a professor at the university of califonia...
...according to computer science professor Stuart Russell...
...an associate professor of medicine at the university...
...a professor at the Harvard Business School...
...a professor at the European Institute of Business Administration...
...Just imagine! We have to finish reading 300 pages before Monday! How can the professor expect us to do it in such a short time...
